Reviews.Title: “VERY GOOD PLACE TO STAY IN AMSTERDAM”
Reviews.Author: highflyeye
Reviews.Content: experience staying jan 2012 spotless location short walk tram 24 5 centre 15 minutes getting amsterdam hotel easy negative 7 euro day pass centre worth buying tickets journey day pass soon issues staff pleasant helpful rated hotel 5 location

Reviews.Title: “Very bad service - Doesn't stand up to its 4 stars”
Reviews.Author: lacordaire
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel week business trip wont return anytime soon recommend hotel future business trips internet access poor connections interrupted time breakfast ok lunch varied rude service clean service mediocre start wait half hour ready credit cart waitress key notice reason hadnt credit cart properly joke knowing business travellers company paying expenses treated thief course appreciate

Reviews.Title: “Bad service”
Reviews.Author: PeterKNewYork
Reviews.Content: tv reception fix wrong itwhen checked hotel charged tv anyway admitted own fault disappointing

HotelInfo.Name: Apollofirst - Hampshire Classic
